mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, CREATE_DT, PARENT_REPLY_NO, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, MEMBER_NO FROM REPLY_S JOIN MEMBER_S USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ${boardNo} AND REPLY_ST = 'N' ORDER BY (CASE WHEN PARENT_REPLY_NO IS NULL THEN REPLY_NO WHEN PARENT_REPLY_NO IS NOT NULL THEN PARENT_REPLY_NO END), REPLY_NO
